title: AI Policy Brief Assistant
subtitle: Answer a few questions to generate a policy brief outline
description: Policy briefs require specific structure and expertise. Let AI help you get started with a structured outline based on your inputs.

topic.title: What is your topic?
topic.description: Describe the main subject of your policy brief
topic.label: Policy Brief Topic
topic.placeholder: e.g., The impact of AI on the labor market in Saudi Arabia...
topic.help: Briefly describe the topic your policy brief will address

audience.title: Who is your audience?
audience.description: Select the primary audience for this brief
audience.label: Target Audience

message.title: What is your key message?
message.description: Summarize the main point you want to convey
message.label: Key Message
message.placeholder: What is the main point or recommendation you want to convey to your audience?
message.help: Summarize the core message or recommendation in 2-3 sentences

context.label: Additional Context (Optional)
context.placeholder: Any additional information that might help generate a better outline...

generate.title: Generate Outline
generate.description: AI will create a structured outline based on your inputs

generation.generatingDescription: AI is creating a custom policy brief structure for you
generation.successDescription: Review the sections below and edit as needed
generation.failedDescription: An error occurred while generating the outline. Please try again.

errors.topicRequired: Topic must be at least 10 characters
errors.messageRequired: Key message must be at least 20 characters
errors.unauthorized: Please sign in to use this feature

help.title: About AI-Assisted Policy Briefs
help.description: This tool helps you create structured policy briefs by generating an outline based on your topic, audience, and key message. You can then edit and refine the generated sections to create your final document.
benefits: Tailored content suggestions for your audience
Learn policy brief best practices through example
